quotes.quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
Wandering re-establishes the original harmony which once existed between man and the universe.
Happiness is mental harmony; unhappiness is mental inharmony.
Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay.
If you learn to make harmony with your past then there is no mountain you can't conquer in life.

A successful work of art is not one which resolves contradictions in a spurious harmony, but one which expresses the idea of harmony negatively by embodying the contradictions, pure and uncompromised, in its innermost structure.
The simplification of life is one of the steps to inner peace. A persistent simplification will create an inner and outer well-being that places harmony in one's life.
You don't get harmony when everybody sings the same note.
To create a vision of the harmony of the unequal, balance the infinite variety, the chaotic, the contradictions in a unity.
He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
Invisible harmony is better than visible.
Harmony is a beautiful balance between mind, body and soul measured in tender peaceful moments.
A life in harmony with nature, the love of truth and virtue, will purge the eyes to understanding her text.
Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance and order and rhythm and harmony.
Harmony between two individuals is never granted-it has to be conquered indefinitely.
The hidden harmony is better than the obvious.
Harmony is one phase of the law whose spiritual expression is love.
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
Harmony is something we must have with others, but it must start inside us first.
Happiness exists on earth, and it is won through prudent exercise of reason, knowledge of the harmony of the universe, and constant practice of generosity.
